## loadConfig

Load bot configuration from bot.json

Returns **[Object][1]** Configuration object

Get bot personality config

Returns **[Object][1]** Bot persona settings

Get memory settings

Returns **[Object][1]** Memory configuration

Get API settings

Returns **[Object][1]** API configuration

Returns **[Object][1]** Reply behavior configuration
